longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 180 days for holders
of British passports endorsed  British Citizen . 
Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Visitors traveling as tourist can
obtain a visa on arrival at Yerevan (EVN), for a max. stay of
120 days. Fee: AMD 15,000.-, payable in local currency only.
Extension possible.  
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination
